one_reviews_text:
My Quick Thoughts:
This is more an experience for educational purposes and would be great for kids and young people. 
The atmosphere is nice but the textures and dinosaur animations are very basic.
If you want to see Dinosaurs in VR that look MORE realistic I would say check out 'Robinson The Journey'

Impressions Video with Commentary // Oculus Rift S // RTX 2070 Super:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Gx6weYKkUYQ
review_feedback: Great thank you. Yes, our target audience is kids who love dinosaurs. Our goal is to provide a fun and exciting learning experience where kids can really get the sense of the scale of these massive creatures. We are always looking to improve the experience and will do our best to improve the visuals as we update the product.

one_reviews_text: We purchased this app for my 6 years old son and he really likes it. He enjoyed  walking around and learning about the different dinosaurs quite a bit. There are 8 different levels wich provide for a learning experience about each of the dinos in that level. There is also an open world where you can just hang out and discover new dinosours in various settings. The narration was excellent as well as decent graphics. For young dinosaur lovers it is a must have.
